name: The World is
description:
This is a first-person adventure in which you have to make choices that will affect the fate of your world 

The world is on the brink of destruction due to the destructive influence of people. In these conditions, the player will have to choose: save the world, or leave everything as it is. Your task is to balance between the destruction of the world and humanity

INPUT
WASD - Movement
LMB - Hit
Hold RMB - Change Time Dilation
ESQ - Quit Game 
- / + - Change Volume
ENTER (when the game is finished) - Restart the game
